help.description:
**Configuration**
`options` Â» Bot configuration.
`rank` Â» Configure ranks.
`variables` Â» See the variables.
`reset-invites` Â» Reset all invitations..

**General**
`invites` Â» Give the number of invitations of a person.
`top` Â» See the server ranking.
`language` Â» Configure the language.

**Management**
`bonus` Â» Add invitations to a member.

[Install me on your server](https://discord.com/api/oauth2/authorize?client_id=693745744133488670&permissions=8&scope=bot) - [Server Support](https://discord.gg/3AJgKkdvNQ)
